price: 72.Israa-iil xayloy Nafsi (seehadaytu kinnuk) Qiddeeniih kay Qidim mariiy maral haak itta keemaarissen waqdi kassita, Yalli Qiddiime numih caagidiy Qcllisak Sugteeni Ayyaaqeleeh Aybulleele.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَتَلۡتُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَٱدَّٰرَٰءۡتُمۡ فِيهَاۖ وَٱللَّهُ مُخۡرِجٞ مَّا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qataltum nafsan fa-iddāratum fīhā wal-lahu mukh'rijun mā kuntum taktumūna
